advisories: 频繁/强烈的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.artistName: Shenzhen Tongguan Network Technology Co., Ltd.
cn.sellerName: Shenzhen Tongguan Network Technology Co., Ltd.
cn.description:
这是一款革新式的Roguelite游戏：
◆“卡牌构筑×战棋”深度融合的独特玩法。
◆独创的多牌同出玩法带来新鲜体验。

作为硬核向的策略游戏，《魔卡棋旅》有：
◆ 随机生成的战斗场景和地图节点，带来了丰富的战斗体验。
◆ 六个独特的职业，每个职业的构筑玩法都是独一无二的。
◆ 300+张卡牌和100+种秘宝与道具，每一局游戏都是全新的惊奇冒险！
◆ 多周目层层递进的难度挑战。
◆ 碎片化进程保存技术，随时随地玩几下或是持续玩够一局90分钟的冒险全都可以！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.trackCensoredName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防史诗冒险
cn.trackName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防史诗冒险
cn.description:
全世界最令人着迷的防御游戏重磅回归 —— 欢迎来到《王国保卫战：前线》！ 

《王国保卫战：前线》规模更加宏大，战况更胜从前，堪称全新水准的快节奏、超迷人游戏玩法，可谓是实至名归。轻按指挥你的的部队，展开一场史诗级的冒险，保卫这片异国大陆免受飞龙、食人植物和地下世界可怕居民的侵害 —— 你完全可以利用华丽的新防御塔、关卡、英雄和众多好东西，助你将敌人碾碎！（别担心，我们仍然提供前作中的好东西，只不过现在已是陈年经典。） 

《王国保卫战：前线》涵盖众多内容，它就像是完全升级版的诱人火炮，将像素化的欢乐径直发射到你笑逐颜开的小脸上... 可疼了！ 

游戏

•  巩固异国新大陆的前线 —— 在沙漠、丛林甚至地下世界中坚守阵地！

•  八种全新专业防御塔升级！你可以用弩兵堡垒、强大的圣殿骑士、亡灵甚至地震机切开、烤焦和践踏你的敌人 —— 嘿，我们告诉过你会动摇一切的。

•  超过18种防御塔技能！释放死亡骑手、瘟疫毒云或刺客，暗杀你的敌人！

•  超过40位具有独特技能的敌人！随时待命，对抗沙漠沙虫、部落萨满、游牧部落和地下世界恐怖生物。

• 十六位传奇英雄。选择你的战士，训练他们的技能！

•  每个关卡都会出现特殊单位和特色！注意黑龙！

•  残酷无情的头目战！嘿，我们告诉过你会有这些升级...

•  70多个成就，让你尽享游戏时间！

•  经典、钢铁和英雄游戏模式，挑战你的战术技能！

•  三种难度模式！你是否准备迎接真正的挑战？试试困难模式吧！
振奋人心的配乐，圆润醇厚的旁白，加上图文并茂的动画效果，真令人陶醉其中而不能自拔！（自然也包括动画的鲜血效果。）

•  游戏内百科全书！真正的战士知己知彼... 对防御塔的了解也不例外。用功研读吧！

《王国保卫战》所获赞誉：IGN编辑精选游戏，Slide To Play必玩游戏，148 Apps编辑精选游戏，Jay is Games年度游戏，Pocket Gamer金奖，Touch Arcade 4.5/5，CNET。最佳iPad游戏

偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
hk.description:
Escape your childhood fears.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!
 Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears!
Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.
As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover.
Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!
Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.
Sneak your way out of the Maw’s dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. 

FEATURES

- Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure
- Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants
- Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles
- Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE

- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- Compatible with MFi controllers

If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.trackCensoredName: 勇者鬥惡龍 創世小玩家
hk.releaseNotes: 修復了應用程式內購買無法正常運作的問題。
hk.trackName: 勇者鬥惡龍 創世小玩家
hk.description:
"""「由 SQUARE ENIX 帶來的《勇者鬥惡龍創世小玩家》現在能在手機上遊玩了！讓你能在任何地方探索由方塊組成的世界中任何角落，收集、組裝和建造各種物品並擊敗邪惡龍王！

◆在寬廣的《勇者鬥惡龍》世界中探索旅行！
在這款「由方塊建構 RPG」中，你將扮演有建造能力的傳奇建造者！阿雷夫嘉爾德王國因為萬魔的統治者——凶惡恐怖的邪惡龍王——而陷入黑暗中。讓我們一同經歷這趟傳奇冒險，拯救阿雷夫加爾德王國吧！

◆面對凶惡的敵人！
你將會遇到史萊姆、魔像、巨龍以及其他魔物。玩家熟悉的各式《勇者鬥惡龍》魔物將威脅人類的存亡！製作武器、打造防具並和魔物們作戰以保衛你的基地。使用你的建造能力和智慧在動作戰鬥中迎戰駭人魔物！

◆ 在任何地方進行收集、組裝並建造物品！
在這個由方塊構成的世界中，任何所見之物都能當成創造素材！農場元素、製作各種物品並建造你的基地來集結同伴探索遺跡。從建築到整個城鎮，你都能自由建造，蓋出屬於你的特色城鎮。建造的能力就掌握在你的手中！

◆ 增加了獨家特色讓手機遊玩更容易！
只需要輕觸螢幕就能放置方塊，透過專門設計的游標讓破壞方塊和物品更容易。加入了方便的復原按鍵，讓你能輕鬆復原你的作品！
也能將你的建築變成建築卡片，與你的好友分享，或是掃描他們的建築，放置在你的島上！

◆ 遊戲內購加入新的追加內容
新的追加內容「Terra Incognita」提供另一片讓你能自由建造遊玩的土地！
DLC 內容包含：
•「魔毯」、「頭目怪物組」、「行星儀」、「點陣戒指」
•「追加道具組」（包含上述四項）
*請注意不要重複購買。」""

系統環境
iOS13.0 以上
iPhone8 以上（系統記憶體 3GB 以上）

※使用非建議裝置可能因記憶體不足而發生強制終止等無法預測的問題。此外也無法針對非建議裝置提供相關支援，敬請見諒。"

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想

偶爾/輕度的模擬賭博內容
hk.trackName: 勇者鬥惡龍X　覺醒的五種族　OFFLINE
hk.description:
◆這是能離線遊玩的《勇者鬥惡龍X》的「故事」
《勇者鬥惡龍X OFFLINE》中文版登陸智慧型手機！

《勇者鬥惡龍X　OFFLINE》終於推出中文版！
在「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中，親身體驗壯大的冒險！

◆玩家的靈魂將轉生至「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中
＜冒險的舞台＞
本作中展開冒險的舞台是由五個大陸與數個島嶼組成的世界「雅斯特露琪亞」。
主角（玩家）將遊歷五個種族居住的各個大陸，
與夥伴們一起踏上旅程，拯救逐漸被魔瘴侵蝕的雅斯特露琪亞！

【資料下載注意事項】
※欲遊玩遊戲本篇，需要額外下載約9GB的資料。
※建議盡可能在良好的連線環境下進行下載。

◆超大型擴充下載內容
描繪了本篇結束後故事，內容豐厚的超大型擴充下載內容「勇者鬥惡龍X　沉睡的勇者與引導的盟友　OFFLINE」也與本篇同步推出！
在「冷達西亞」編織出你和勇者之間關於羈絆的故事吧。

＜冒險的舞台＞
為了見到古蘭澤朵拉王國的「勇者公主」，主角（玩家）將乘坐豪華遊輪「大巨人號」前往全新的冒險舞台——冷達西亞大地！
之後為了達到某個目的，你需要一邊聽取神秘青年庫洛茲的建議，一邊周遊各地，並逐步接近新大陸的「謎團」。

【超大型擴充下載內容相關注意事項】
※超大型擴充下載內容須另行付費購買。
※超大型擴充下載內容需要連接網路才能下載。
※若要推進超大型擴充下載內容的故事，則必須先將《勇者鬥惡龍X　覺醒的五種族　OFFLINE》本篇遊玩至結局。

◆系統需求
iOS：13.0以上，推薦使用系統記憶體 6GB 以上的機型

【運作相關注意事項】
※ 根據您的裝置性能、規格，或是其他應用程式的使用情況，可能會發生強制結束等意料之外的問題。
※ 若遊戲畫面出現異常或運作延遲，可嘗試調整圖像設定以進行改善。

hk.trackName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
hk.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

hk.releaseNotes:
在這次新的獨家戰役中，將那些討厭的海盜擊沉到海底吧！
- 通過 5 個新關卡：掠奪海盜王的島嶼，尋找隱藏的寶藏。
- 新敵人：讓海盜、海盜船長、鸚鵡、調皮的猴子等走上跳板！
- BOSS戰：為 5 個“海盜王”準備好炮彈，其中包括一個熟悉的面孔。
- 新英雄：遇見幽靈船船長 Lucerna，擁有幽靈力量和強大的火力！
- 新塔：食人魔沉船，一個被熱心好戰者佔領的破碎船隻。
- 新成就：沒有美味的寶藏，海盜冒險算什麼？
- 大量復活節彩蛋：在深海中也有笑話！
hk.description:
威猛全能的巫師威之難回來了！開啟一趟史詩之旅，召集他的軍隊，完成他的陰謀計劃…木哈哈哈。讓整個王國知道誰才是真正的頭目！奮力向前，征服新的領地，還有那些不錯的舊領地。在這款幽默史詩的經典塔防遊戲中，直面強大敵人的帝國，對抗超威的頭目！
遊戲特色

- 22種具有特殊技能與力量的新防禦塔。
- 選擇防禦塔武器，組合成超強破壞力的裝備，阻止敵人進攻！
- 三個大陸上的42個挑戰關卡，已準備好等你來！
- 17個強大的英雄，毫不猶豫聽候你的調遣。
- 超過60種死敵來測驗你的智慧與戰術技巧。
- 在最傳奇的頭目戰鬥中，打敗17位威武的魔王，包圍你的王國！
- 新的能力與援軍，助你殲滅敵人。
- 10多種小物件與法器，在戰鬥中提供額外優勢。
- 30種升級可訓練軍隊到最佳狀態。
- 60多種成就，隱藏的秘密和其他好玩的東東等你來發現！
- 你的黑塔里沒有WiFi？不用擔心，可以離線玩哦！

hk.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

hk.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

hk.description:
"""你是否知道“Schadenfreude”是德语单词，意思是幸灾乐祸？这也是构建《邻居地狱归来》的主要思想。整个电视节目基于对你的脾气暴躁的邻居进行越来越残酷的恶作剧，以使观众开心，收视率高。在受2000年代早期邪恶电视启发的闹剧盛会中变坏很不错！ 

作为《邻居地狱归来》的睚眦必报的主角伍迪，你将穿越虚构但恰如其名的电视节目的第1季和第2季。一路上对讨厌的邻居进行恶作剧，一直到中国、印度、墨西哥，你将确保他的假期成为活生生的地狱。当你在进行恶作剧时，为什么只瞄准邻居呢？你可以让他的母亲和其他旅伴牵涉其中。无论你决定做什么，你值得信赖的摄制组都会在那里，并时刻关注所有行动。你可以让自己狂放的创造力自由驰骋，并观看邻居在绝望中愤怒。请注意不要被他或他的同伴抓住，否则他们会大声呼叫，并且你的电视节目将被停播。另一方面，如果你表现良好，则通过在邻居的生活中造成越来越多的混乱，收视率将会提高，你可能会赢得声名远播的奖项。 ""

邻居地狱归来1和2在一个包中进行重制：28个剧集，以邻居家中、邮轮上以及世界各地几个不同的度假地点为背景

- 在全高清中新渲染的所有图形
- 所有动画的帧率翻倍，带来更流畅的体验
- 使用隐身、技巧和风格进行完美的伏击
- 使用简单的界面和控件
- 精湛的卡通风格图形
- 大乐队配乐 


© HandyGames

hk.description:
Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again!

Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics.

Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards.

FEATURES
- Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics
- Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX
- Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets
- Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade...
- Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivière and legend Yuzo Koshiro
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter"- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics !

* NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE*

- New co-op moves
- +300 in-game improvements
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter

-MULTIPLAYER UPDATE-

- Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together!
- Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels"

-Mr. X Nightmare DLC-
The fight continues in Wood Oak City.
After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X’s brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. 
With this DLC, get ready for:
• 3 new playable characters
• A new Survival mode with weekly challenges
• Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves
• New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release.

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFicontrollers
- No micro-transactions!

Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go!

If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

Gerçekler karanlıkta kalmaz…
İstanbul’un sokakları, tarihi yapıları ve karanlık sırları arasında geçen bu dedektiflik bulmacasında, her bölüm yeni bir vakayı çözmek için seni bekliyor.

Delil Zinciri, bölüm bölüm ilerleyen, şüphelileri sorguladığın ve kanıtları bir araya getirerek gizemi çözdüğün sürükleyici bir dedektiflik oyunudur. Oyunun kalbinde kart temelli sorgulama sistemi bulunuyor:

Tanıkları çapraz sorguya al,
Arşivleri tarayarak bilgi topla,
Özel araçlar ile izleri bul,
Şüphelilerin tutarsız ifadelerini ortaya çıkar!
Her bölüm İstanbul’un farklı bir semtinde geçiyor: Galata’nın dar sokaklarından, Kadıköy’deki eski bir sahaf dükkanına kadar birçok farklı ve gizemli mekânda, yeni ipuçları seni bekliyor...

hk.description:
經典的砍殺遊戲終於推出 iOS 版，Heart Machine這款曾獲獎的遊戲現在以最精良且優質的特殊版本登場。


► 在享有盛譽的獨立遊戲節（Independent Games Festival）中獲得觀眾人氣大獎以及最佳視覺美術獎。

► 在最佳視覺設計、最佳音效以及最佳原創遊戲類別中獲得超過 14 項提名。

► 9/10 Destructoid – 卓越表現的典範。儘管有缺失但仍瑕不掩瑜，且不至於對遊戲造成重大影響。

► 9.5/10 Game Informer – 配樂、美術以及打鬥場景值得您沉浸其中並深入探索。

► Eurogamer 推薦 – Heart Machine 開發的砍殺遊戲不僅充滿挑戰性，且非常細緻，畫面也十分漂亮。

► 9/10 GameSpot – 不僅僅是單純的畫面漂亮；《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》所呈現的視覺效果可以指引您，且讓您放鬆。在緊張刺激的打鬥場景中，壯觀美景能讓您稍喘口氣。 

► 8.5 Polygon – 無論是思考戰略的時刻或是驚險的動作場景，《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》取得了兩者之間的完美平衡。

► Darkstation 5 顆星–上帝視角的動作角色扮演遊戲《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》非常棒：漂亮、迷人的世界供探索、遊戲操作靈敏、悅耳的配樂，並且對玩家有信心，相信他們可以自己想出遊戲進行的方式。


黑暗且暴力的過往陰影籠罩著這片不羈之地，當中滿是寶藏與鮮血。這個世界的旅者是收藏家，專門收集遺忘的知識、失落的科技以及破碎的歷史。我們的旅者被一種無法滿足的疾病纏身，朝著時間埋葬之地深入挺進，希望能找到治癒重症的方法。

《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》是動作冒險角色扮演遊戲，使用經典的16-bit 模式，再加上現代化的遊戲機制與更大規模的設計。探索這個美麗且廣大的荒廢之地，當中危機四伏且暗藏著失落科技。


特色：

● 支援 iPad Pro 120 fps 的畫面幀率/支援 iPhone 與 iPad 60 fps的畫面幀率。
● 與 MFi 控制手把相容。
● 遊戲中心（Game Center）成就。
● 觸覺震動。
● 從每一位角色到細緻的背景元素，一切都是手繪動畫的心血傑作。
● 容易上手但難以駕馭；敵人又壞又多，處處危機讓您脆弱的身體不堪一擊，且盟友又寥寥可數。
● 升級武器、學習新技能、探索裝備，在這個黑暗且暗藏細節的世界中，穿越一條條的路徑支線，揭開秘密。
● 沉浸在由Disasterpeace 所作的美妙配樂中。
● 不僅有原始遊戲中的所有內容，再加上更多武器、敵人以及特殊版本的區域。

mo.description:
Escape your childhood fears.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!
 Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears!
Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.
As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover.
Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!
Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.
Sneak your way out of the Maw’s dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. 

FEATURES

- Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure
- Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants
- Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles
- Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE

- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- Compatible with MFi controllers

If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.trackName: 勇者鬥惡龍 創世小玩家
mo.releaseNotes: 修復了應用程式內購買無法正常運作的問題。
mo.description:
"""「由 SQUARE ENIX 帶來的《勇者鬥惡龍創世小玩家》現在能在手機上遊玩了！讓你能在任何地方探索由方塊組成的世界中任何角落，收集、組裝和建造各種物品並擊敗邪惡龍王！

◆在寬廣的《勇者鬥惡龍》世界中探索旅行！
在這款「由方塊建構 RPG」中，你將扮演有建造能力的傳奇建造者！阿雷夫嘉爾德王國因為萬魔的統治者——凶惡恐怖的邪惡龍王——而陷入黑暗中。讓我們一同經歷這趟傳奇冒險，拯救阿雷夫加爾德王國吧！

◆面對凶惡的敵人！
你將會遇到史萊姆、魔像、巨龍以及其他魔物。玩家熟悉的各式《勇者鬥惡龍》魔物將威脅人類的存亡！製作武器、打造防具並和魔物們作戰以保衛你的基地。使用你的建造能力和智慧在動作戰鬥中迎戰駭人魔物！

◆ 在任何地方進行收集、組裝並建造物品！
在這個由方塊構成的世界中，任何所見之物都能當成創造素材！農場元素、製作各種物品並建造你的基地來集結同伴探索遺跡。從建築到整個城鎮，你都能自由建造，蓋出屬於你的特色城鎮。建造的能力就掌握在你的手中！

◆ 增加了獨家特色讓手機遊玩更容易！
只需要輕觸螢幕就能放置方塊，透過專門設計的游標讓破壞方塊和物品更容易。加入了方便的復原按鍵，讓你能輕鬆復原你的作品！
也能將你的建築變成建築卡片，與你的好友分享，或是掃描他們的建築，放置在你的島上！

◆ 遊戲內購加入新的追加內容
新的追加內容「Terra Incognita」提供另一片讓你能自由建造遊玩的土地！
DLC 內容包含：
•「魔毯」、「頭目怪物組」、「行星儀」、「點陣戒指」
•「追加道具組」（包含上述四項）
*請注意不要重複購買。」""

系統環境
iOS13.0 以上
iPhone8 以上（系統記憶體 3GB 以上）

※使用非建議裝置可能因記憶體不足而發生強制終止等無法預測的問題。此外也無法針對非建議裝置提供相關支援，敬請見諒。"

mo.trackCensoredName: 勇者鬥惡龍X　覺醒的五種族　OFFLINE
mo.trackName: 勇者鬥惡龍X　覺醒的五種族　OFFLINE
mo.description:
◆這是能離線遊玩的《勇者鬥惡龍X》的「故事」
《勇者鬥惡龍X OFFLINE》中文版登陸智慧型手機！

《勇者鬥惡龍X　OFFLINE》終於推出中文版！
在「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中，親身體驗壯大的冒險！

◆玩家的靈魂將轉生至「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中
＜冒險的舞台＞
本作中展開冒險的舞台是由五個大陸與數個島嶼組成的世界「雅斯特露琪亞」。
主角（玩家）將遊歷五個種族居住的各個大陸，
與夥伴們一起踏上旅程，拯救逐漸被魔瘴侵蝕的雅斯特露琪亞！

【資料下載注意事項】
※欲遊玩遊戲本篇，需要額外下載約9GB的資料。
※建議盡可能在良好的連線環境下進行下載。

◆超大型擴充下載內容
描繪了本篇結束後故事，內容豐厚的超大型擴充下載內容「勇者鬥惡龍X　沉睡的勇者與引導的盟友　OFFLINE」也與本篇同步推出！
在「冷達西亞」編織出你和勇者之間關於羈絆的故事吧。

＜冒險的舞台＞
為了見到古蘭澤朵拉王國的「勇者公主」，主角（玩家）將乘坐豪華遊輪「大巨人號」前往全新的冒險舞台——冷達西亞大地！
之後為了達到某個目的，你需要一邊聽取神秘青年庫洛茲的建議，一邊周遊各地，並逐步接近新大陸的「謎團」。

【超大型擴充下載內容相關注意事項】
※超大型擴充下載內容須另行付費購買。
※超大型擴充下載內容需要連接網路才能下載。
※若要推進超大型擴充下載內容的故事，則必須先將《勇者鬥惡龍X　覺醒的五種族　OFFLINE》本篇遊玩至結局。

◆系統需求
iOS：13.0以上，推薦使用系統記憶體 6GB 以上的機型

【運作相關注意事項】
※ 根據您的裝置性能、規格，或是其他應用程式的使用情況，可能會發生強制結束等意料之外的問題。
※ 若遊戲畫面出現異常或運作延遲，可嘗試調整圖像設定以進行改善。

mo.trackCensoredName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
mo.trackName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
mo.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.releaseNotes:
在這次新的獨家戰役中，將那些討厭的海盜擊沉到海底吧！
- 通過 5 個新關卡：掠奪海盜王的島嶼，尋找隱藏的寶藏。
- 新敵人：讓海盜、海盜船長、鸚鵡、調皮的猴子等走上跳板！
- BOSS戰：為 5 個“海盜王”準備好炮彈，其中包括一個熟悉的面孔。
- 新英雄：遇見幽靈船船長 Lucerna，擁有幽靈力量和強大的火力！
- 新塔：食人魔沉船，一個被熱心好戰者佔領的破碎船隻。
- 新成就：沒有美味的寶藏，海盜冒險算什麼？
- 大量復活節彩蛋：在深海中也有笑話！
mo.description:
威猛全能的巫師威之難回來了！開啟一趟史詩之旅，召集他的軍隊，完成他的陰謀計劃…木哈哈哈。讓整個王國知道誰才是真正的頭目！奮力向前，征服新的領地，還有那些不錯的舊領地。在這款幽默史詩的經典塔防遊戲中，直面強大敵人的帝國，對抗超威的頭目！
遊戲特色

- 22種具有特殊技能與力量的新防禦塔。
- 選擇防禦塔武器，組合成超強破壞力的裝備，阻止敵人進攻！
- 三個大陸上的42個挑戰關卡，已準備好等你來！
- 17個強大的英雄，毫不猶豫聽候你的調遣。
- 超過60種死敵來測驗你的智慧與戰術技巧。
- 在最傳奇的頭目戰鬥中，打敗17位威武的魔王，包圍你的王國！
- 新的能力與援軍，助你殲滅敵人。
- 10多種小物件與法器，在戰鬥中提供額外優勢。
- 30種升級可訓練軍隊到最佳狀態。
- 60多種成就，隱藏的秘密和其他好玩的東東等你來發現！
- 你的黑塔里沒有WiFi？不用擔心，可以離線玩哦！

這裡有魔王威之難最新訊息：
https://www.kingdomrushvengeance.com/

條款及條件：
https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService

隱私權政策：
https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy

mo.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

--

mo.description:
"""你是否知道“Schadenfreude”是德语单词，意思是幸灾乐祸？这也是构建《邻居地狱归来》的主要思想。整个电视节目基于对你的脾气暴躁的邻居进行越来越残酷的恶作剧，以使观众开心，收视率高。在受2000年代早期邪恶电视启发的闹剧盛会中变坏很不错！ 

作为《邻居地狱归来》的睚眦必报的主角伍迪，你将穿越虚构但恰如其名的电视节目的第1季和第2季。一路上对讨厌的邻居进行恶作剧，一直到中国、印度、墨西哥，你将确保他的假期成为活生生的地狱。当你在进行恶作剧时，为什么只瞄准邻居呢？你可以让他的母亲和其他旅伴牵涉其中。无论你决定做什么，你值得信赖的摄制组都会在那里，并时刻关注所有行动。你可以让自己狂放的创造力自由驰骋，并观看邻居在绝望中愤怒。请注意不要被他或他的同伴抓住，否则他们会大声呼叫，并且你的电视节目将被停播。另一方面，如果你表现良好，则通过在邻居的生活中造成越来越多的混乱，收视率将会提高，你可能会赢得声名远播的奖项。 ""

邻居地狱归来1和2在一个包中进行重制：28个剧集，以邻居家中、邮轮上以及世界各地几个不同的度假地点为背景

- 在全高清中新渲染的所有图形
- 所有动画的帧率翻倍，带来更流畅的体验
- 使用隐身、技巧和风格进行完美的伏击
- 使用简单的界面和控件
- 精湛的卡通风格图形
- 大乐队配乐 


© HandyGames

mo.description:
Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again!

Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics.

Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards.

FEATURES
- Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics
- Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX
- Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets
- Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade...
- Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivière and legend Yuzo Koshiro
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter"- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics !

* NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE*

- New co-op moves
- +300 in-game improvements
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter

-MULTIPLAYER UPDATE-

- Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together!
- Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels"

-Mr. X Nightmare DLC-
The fight continues in Wood Oak City.
After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X’s brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. 
With this DLC, get ready for:
• 3 new playable characters
• A new Survival mode with weekly challenges
• Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves
• New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release.

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFicontrollers
- No micro-transactions!

Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go!

If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

mo.description:
經典的砍殺遊戲終於推出 iOS 版，Heart Machine這款曾獲獎的遊戲現在以最精良且優質的特殊版本登場。


► 在享有盛譽的獨立遊戲節（Independent Games Festival）中獲得觀眾人氣大獎以及最佳視覺美術獎。

► 在最佳視覺設計、最佳音效以及最佳原創遊戲類別中獲得超過 14 項提名。

► 9/10 Destructoid – 卓越表現的典範。儘管有缺失但仍瑕不掩瑜，且不至於對遊戲造成重大影響。

► 9.5/10 Game Informer – 配樂、美術以及打鬥場景值得您沉浸其中並深入探索。

► Eurogamer 推薦 – Heart Machine 開發的砍殺遊戲不僅充滿挑戰性，且非常細緻，畫面也十分漂亮。

► 9/10 GameSpot – 不僅僅是單純的畫面漂亮；《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》所呈現的視覺效果可以指引您，且讓您放鬆。在緊張刺激的打鬥場景中，壯觀美景能讓您稍喘口氣。 

► 8.5 Polygon – 無論是思考戰略的時刻或是驚險的動作場景，《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》取得了兩者之間的完美平衡。

► Darkstation 5 顆星–上帝視角的動作角色扮演遊戲《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》非常棒：漂亮、迷人的世界供探索、遊戲操作靈敏、悅耳的配樂，並且對玩家有信心，相信他們可以自己想出遊戲進行的方式。


黑暗且暴力的過往陰影籠罩著這片不羈之地，當中滿是寶藏與鮮血。這個世界的旅者是收藏家，專門收集遺忘的知識、失落的科技以及破碎的歷史。我們的旅者被一種無法滿足的疾病纏身，朝著時間埋葬之地深入挺進，希望能找到治癒重症的方法。

《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》是動作冒險角色扮演遊戲，使用經典的16-bit 模式，再加上現代化的遊戲機制與更大規模的設計。探索這個美麗且廣大的荒廢之地，當中危機四伏且暗藏著失落科技。


特色：

● 支援 iPad Pro 120 fps 的畫面幀率/支援 iPhone 與 iPad 60 fps的畫面幀率。
● 與 MFi 控制手把相容。
● 遊戲中心（Game Center）成就。
● 觸覺震動。
● 從每一位角色到細緻的背景元素，一切都是手繪動畫的心血傑作。
● 容易上手但難以駕馭；敵人又壞又多，處處危機讓您脆弱的身體不堪一擊，且盟友又寥寥可數。
● 升級武器、學習新技能、探索裝備，在這個黑暗且暗藏細節的世界中，穿越一條條的路徑支線，揭開秘密。
● 沉浸在由Disasterpeace 所作的美妙配樂中。
● 不僅有原始遊戲中的所有內容，再加上更多武器、敵人以及特殊版本的區域。

tw.description:
Escape your childhood fears.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!
 Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears!
Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.
As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover.
Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!
Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.
Sneak your way out of the Maw’s dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. 

FEATURES

- Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure
- Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants
- Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles
- Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE

- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- Compatible with MFi controllers

If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.

tw.trackName: 勇者鬥惡龍 創世小玩家
tw.releaseNotes: 修復了應用程式內購買無法正常運作的問題。
tw.description:
"""「由 SQUARE ENIX 帶來的《勇者鬥惡龍創世小玩家》現在能在手機上遊玩了！讓你能在任何地方探索由方塊組成的世界中任何角落，收集、組裝和建造各種物品並擊敗邪惡龍王！

◆在寬廣的《勇者鬥惡龍》世界中探索旅行！
在這款「由方塊建構 RPG」中，你將扮演有建造能力的傳奇建造者！阿雷夫嘉爾德王國因為萬魔的統治者——凶惡恐怖的邪惡龍王——而陷入黑暗中。讓我們一同經歷這趟傳奇冒險，拯救阿雷夫加爾德王國吧！

◆面對凶惡的敵人！
你將會遇到史萊姆、魔像、巨龍以及其他魔物。玩家熟悉的各式《勇者鬥惡龍》魔物將威脅人類的存亡！製作武器、打造防具並和魔物們作戰以保衛你的基地。使用你的建造能力和智慧在動作戰鬥中迎戰駭人魔物！

◆ 在任何地方進行收集、組裝並建造物品！
在這個由方塊構成的世界中，任何所見之物都能當成創造素材！農場元素、製作各種物品並建造你的基地來集結同伴探索遺跡。從建築到整個城鎮，你都能自由建造，蓋出屬於你的特色城鎮。建造的能力就掌握在你的手中！

◆ 增加了獨家特色讓手機遊玩更容易！
只需要輕觸螢幕就能放置方塊，透過專門設計的游標讓破壞方塊和物品更容易。加入了方便的復原按鍵，讓你能輕鬆復原你的作品！
也能將你的建築變成建築卡片，與你的好友分享，或是掃描他們的建築，放置在你的島上！

◆ 遊戲內購加入新的追加內容
新的追加內容「Terra Incognita」提供另一片讓你能自由建造遊玩的土地！
DLC 內容包含：
•「魔毯」、「頭目怪物組」、「行星儀」、「點陣戒指」
•「追加道具組」（包含上述四項）
*請注意不要重複購買。」""

系統環境
iOS13.0 以上
iPhone8 以上（系統記憶體 3GB 以上）

tw.trackName: 勇者鬥惡龍X　覺醒的五種族　OFFLINE
tw.description:
◆這是能離線遊玩的《勇者鬥惡龍X》的「故事」
《勇者鬥惡龍X OFFLINE》中文版登陸智慧型手機！

《勇者鬥惡龍X　OFFLINE》終於推出中文版！
在「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中，親身體驗壯大的冒險！

◆玩家的靈魂將轉生至「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中
＜冒險的舞台＞
本作中展開冒險的舞台是由五個大陸與數個島嶼組成的世界「雅斯特露琪亞」。
主角（玩家）將遊歷五個種族居住的各個大陸，
與夥伴們一起踏上旅程，拯救逐漸被魔瘴侵蝕的雅斯特露琪亞！

【資料下載注意事項】
※欲遊玩遊戲本篇，需要額外下載約9GB的資料。
※建議盡可能在良好的連線環境下進行下載。

◆超大型擴充下載內容
描繪了本篇結束後故事，內容豐厚的超大型擴充下載內容「勇者鬥惡龍X　沉睡的勇者與引導的盟友　OFFLINE」也與本篇同步推出！
在「冷達西亞」編織出你和勇者之間關於羈絆的故事吧。

＜冒險的舞台＞
為了見到古蘭澤朵拉王國的「勇者公主」，主角（玩家）將乘坐豪華遊輪「大巨人號」前往全新的冒險舞台——冷達西亞大地！
之後為了達到某個目的，你需要一邊聽取神秘青年庫洛茲的建議，一邊周遊各地，並逐步接近新大陸的「謎團」。

【超大型擴充下載內容相關注意事項】
※超大型擴充下載內容須另行付費購買。
※超大型擴充下載內容需要連接網路才能下載。
※若要推進超大型擴充下載內容的故事，則必須先將《勇者鬥惡龍X　覺醒的五種族　OFFLINE》本篇遊玩至結局。

◆系統需求
iOS：13.0以上，推薦使用系統記憶體 6GB 以上的機型

【運作相關注意事項】
※ 根據您的裝置性能、規格，或是其他應用程式的使用情況，可能會發生強制結束等意料之外的問題。
※ 若遊戲畫面出現異常或運作延遲，可嘗試調整圖像設定以進行改善。

tw.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

tw.trackName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
tw.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.releaseNotes:
在這次新的獨家戰役中，將那些討厭的海盜擊沉到海底吧！
- 通過 5 個新關卡：掠奪海盜王的島嶼，尋找隱藏的寶藏。
- 新敵人：讓海盜、海盜船長、鸚鵡、調皮的猴子等走上跳板！
- BOSS戰：為 5 個“海盜王”準備好炮彈，其中包括一個熟悉的面孔。
- 新英雄：遇見幽靈船船長 Lucerna，擁有幽靈力量和強大的火力！
- 新塔：食人魔沉船，一個被熱心好戰者佔領的破碎船隻。
- 新成就：沒有美味的寶藏，海盜冒險算什麼？
- 大量復活節彩蛋：在深海中也有笑話！
tw.description:
威猛全能的巫師威之難回來了！開啟一趟史詩之旅，召集他的軍隊，完成他的陰謀計劃…木哈哈哈。讓整個王國知道誰才是真正的頭目！奮力向前，征服新的領地，還有那些不錯的舊領地。在這款幽默史詩的經典塔防遊戲中，直面強大敵人的帝國，對抗超威的頭目！
遊戲特色

- 22種具有特殊技能與力量的新防禦塔。
- 選擇防禦塔武器，組合成超強破壞力的裝備，阻止敵人進攻！
- 三個大陸上的42個挑戰關卡，已準備好等你來！
- 17個強大的英雄，毫不猶豫聽候你的調遣。
- 超過60種死敵來測驗你的智慧與戰術技巧。
- 在最傳奇的頭目戰鬥中，打敗17位威武的魔王，包圍你的王國！
- 新的能力與援軍，助你殲滅敵人。
- 10多種小物件與法器，在戰鬥中提供額外優勢。
- 30種升級可訓練軍隊到最佳狀態。
- 60多種成就，隱藏的秘密和其他好玩的東東等你來發現！
- 你的黑塔里沒有WiFi？不用擔心，可以離線玩哦！

這裡有魔王威之難最新訊息：
https://www.kingdomrushvengeance.com/

https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService

tw.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

--

tw.description:
"""你是否知道“Schadenfreude”是德语单词，意思是幸灾乐祸？这也是构建《邻居地狱归来》的主要思想。整个电视节目基于对你的脾气暴躁的邻居进行越来越残酷的恶作剧，以使观众开心，收视率高。在受2000年代早期邪恶电视启发的闹剧盛会中变坏很不错！ 

作为《邻居地狱归来》的睚眦必报的主角伍迪，你将穿越虚构但恰如其名的电视节目的第1季和第2季。一路上对讨厌的邻居进行恶作剧，一直到中国、印度、墨西哥，你将确保他的假期成为活生生的地狱。当你在进行恶作剧时，为什么只瞄准邻居呢？你可以让他的母亲和其他旅伴牵涉其中。无论你决定做什么，你值得信赖的摄制组都会在那里，并时刻关注所有行动。你可以让自己狂放的创造力自由驰骋，并观看邻居在绝望中愤怒。请注意不要被他或他的同伴抓住，否则他们会大声呼叫，并且你的电视节目将被停播。另一方面，如果你表现良好，则通过在邻居的生活中造成越来越多的混乱，收视率将会提高，你可能会赢得声名远播的奖项。 ""

邻居地狱归来1和2在一个包中进行重制：28个剧集，以邻居家中、邮轮上以及世界各地几个不同的度假地点为背景

- 在全高清中新渲染的所有图形
- 所有动画的帧率翻倍，带来更流畅的体验
- 使用隐身、技巧和风格进行完美的伏击
- 使用简单的界面和控件
- 精湛的卡通风格图形

tw.description:
Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again!

Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics.

Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards.

FEATURES
- Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics
- Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX
- Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets
- Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade...
- Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivière and legend Yuzo Koshiro
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter"- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics !

* NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE*

- New co-op moves
- +300 in-game improvements
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter

-MULTIPLAYER UPDATE-

- Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together!
- Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels"

-Mr. X Nightmare DLC-
The fight continues in Wood Oak City.
After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X’s brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. 
With this DLC, get ready for:
• 3 new playable characters
• A new Survival mode with weekly challenges
• Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves
• New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release.

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFicontrollers
- No micro-transactions!

Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go!

Delil Zinciri, bölüm bölüm ilerleyen, şüphelileri sorguladığın ve kanıtları bir araya getirerek gizemi çözdüğün sürükleyici bir dedektiflik oyunudur. Oyunun kalbinde kart temelli sorgulama sistemi bulunuyor:

tw.description:
Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions – no ads, no fuss! 

Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. 

Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! 

The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! 


HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY

1. Download the official MONOPOLY app
2. Press “PLAY”
3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token
4. Roll the dice and move around the board
5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it
6. Collect rent when other players land on it
7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed – will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 
8. If you run out of money, you’ll be bankrupt and out of the game
9. The last player left with a profit wins! 

FEATURES

- MONOPOLY ON THE GO – No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! 
- MULTIPLE MODES – Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! 
- EXCLUSIVE BOARDS – Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! 
- AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE – Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game.

Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game!

The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. © 1935, 2025 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved.

tw.description:
經典的砍殺遊戲終於推出 iOS 版，Heart Machine這款曾獲獎的遊戲現在以最精良且優質的特殊版本登場。


► 在享有盛譽的獨立遊戲節（Independent Games Festival）中獲得觀眾人氣大獎以及最佳視覺美術獎。

► 在最佳視覺設計、最佳音效以及最佳原創遊戲類別中獲得超過 14 項提名。

► 9/10 Destructoid – 卓越表現的典範。儘管有缺失但仍瑕不掩瑜，且不至於對遊戲造成重大影響。

► 9.5/10 Game Informer – 配樂、美術以及打鬥場景值得您沉浸其中並深入探索。

► Eurogamer 推薦 – Heart Machine 開發的砍殺遊戲不僅充滿挑戰性，且非常細緻，畫面也十分漂亮。

► 9/10 GameSpot – 不僅僅是單純的畫面漂亮；《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》所呈現的視覺效果可以指引您，且讓您放鬆。在緊張刺激的打鬥場景中，壯觀美景能讓您稍喘口氣。 

► 8.5 Polygon – 無論是思考戰略的時刻或是驚險的動作場景，《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》取得了兩者之間的完美平衡。

► Darkstation 5 顆星–上帝視角的動作角色扮演遊戲《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》非常棒：漂亮、迷人的世界供探索、遊戲操作靈敏、悅耳的配樂，並且對玩家有信心，相信他們可以自己想出遊戲進行的方式。


黑暗且暴力的過往陰影籠罩著這片不羈之地，當中滿是寶藏與鮮血。這個世界的旅者是收藏家，專門收集遺忘的知識、失落的科技以及破碎的歷史。我們的旅者被一種無法滿足的疾病纏身，朝著時間埋葬之地深入挺進，希望能找到治癒重症的方法。

《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》是動作冒險角色扮演遊戲，使用經典的16-bit 模式，再加上現代化的遊戲機制與更大規模的設計。探索這個美麗且廣大的荒廢之地，當中危機四伏且暗藏著失落科技。


特色：

● 支援 iPad Pro 120 fps 的畫面幀率/支援 iPhone 與 iPad 60 fps的畫面幀率。
● 與 MFi 控制手把相容。
● 遊戲中心（Game Center）成就。
● 觸覺震動。
● 從每一位角色到細緻的背景元素，一切都是手繪動畫的心血傑作。
● 容易上手但難以駕馭；敵人又壞又多，處處危機讓您脆弱的身體不堪一擊，且盟友又寥寥可數。
● 升級武器、學習新技能、探索裝備，在這個黑暗且暗藏細節的世界中，穿越一條條的路徑支線，揭開秘密。
● 沉浸在由Disasterpeace 所作的美妙配樂中。
● 不僅有原始遊戲中的所有內容，再加上更多武器、敵人以及特殊版本的區域。

us.description:
Explore a world made of blocks as you gather, craft, and build to defeat the evil Dragonlord! Build everywhere from anywhere in DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS, available now on mobile. Brought to you by SQUARE ENIX!

◆ TRAVEL AND EXPLORE THE VAST WORLD OF DRAGON QUEST!
In this “Block-Building RPG”, YOU are the legendary builder that has the power to build! The realm of Alefgard has been plunged into darkness by the terrible and treacherous Dragonlord, the ruler of all monsters. Venture off on the epic adventure to restore Alefgard!

◆ FACE OFF AGAINST VICIOUS FOES!
You will encounter Slimes, Golems, Dragons, and more. Familiar DRAGON QUEST monsters of all sizes threaten the survival of humankind! Craft weapons, build defenses, and fight the monsters to protect your base. Use your power to build and play smart when fighting against frightening enemies in action packed combat!

◆ GATHER, CRAFT AND BUILD FROM ANYWHERE!
In this world made of blocks, everything you see can be materials used to create! Farm ingredients, craft various items and build your base to unite the people roaming the ruins.  From buildings to entire towns, you have the freedom to make your village your very own. The power to build is in the palm of your hands!

◆ BUILD BETTER ON MOBILE WITH SPECIAL FEATURES ADDED!
Place blocks by simply tapping the screen and destroy blocks and items more easily with specialized cursors. A convenient Undo Button function has also been added to allow you to restore your work! 
Convert your buildings in to Build Cards to share with friends and scan their buildings to have them show up in your island!
◆ NEW DLC AS IN-APP PURCHASES
New DLC added in “Terra Incognita,” the land where you can freely build and play!
DLC includes:
• “Magic carpet”, “Boss figure pack”, “Celestial pack”, “Dot ring”
• “All in one pack” (A set of the above 4)
*Please be aware of duplicate purchases.

"OS:
iOS 13 or later
iPhone 8 or later (minimum 3GB of RAM)"

*Playing this game on a non-recommended device may result in unexpected errors, such as crashing due to insufficient memory. Please be aware that we may not be able to provide support for non-recommended devices.

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

us.description:
"Did you know that “Schadenfreude” is a German word defined as the concept of finding joy in someone else’s misfortune? It is also the main idea on which Neighbours back From Hell is built. A whole TV show based on playing increasingly outrageous pranks on your grumpy neighbor to keep the audience entertained, and viewership numbers high. It’s good to be bad in this early 2000s trash TV-inspired slapstick extravaganza! 

As Woody, the vengeful star protagonist of Neighbours back From Hell, you will prank your way through Seasons 1 and 2 of the fictitious, but aptly named TV show. Take the mischief from your nasty neighbor’s flat all the way to China, India, and Mexico where you will make sure his holiday is a living hell. While you’re at it, why limit targeting your antics at your neighbor, when you can involve his mother and fellow travelers? Whatever you decide to do, your trusty camera crew will be right there and keep a keen eye on all the action. You can let your crooked creativity flow freely and watch the neighbor rage in desperation. Just be mindful not to get caught by him or his companions, or they will whoop you good and your TV show will be taken off the air. If you perform well on the other hand, by creating more and more disarray and chaos in the neighbor’s life, ratings will increase, and you could win prestigious awards. "

Neighbours From Hell 1 & 2 Remastered in one package: 28 episodes set in the neighbor’s home, on a cruise liner, and in several different holiday locations around the world 

- All graphics newly rendered in Full HD 
- Framerate of all animations doubled for a smoother experience  
- Use stealth, skill, and style to perform the perfect ambush 
- Easy to use interface and controls 
- Superb cartoon-style graphics 
- Big band soundtrack 
- Game Center support
- Full controller support

© HandyGames

us.description:
Get ready to jump into action and show the Kingdom who’s the real boss in the best tower defense game!

Face empires of mighty enemies. Clash against supreme bosses, unlocking and switching to new towers. Train legendary heroes and get all the achievements using your strategy in this amazing TD game.

Kingdom Rush Vengeance will give you hours and hours of gameplay in the best tower defense game available! 

Heroes, your Army, Enemies, and legendary td bossfights!
- 17 Powerful HEROES who will, without hesitation, rush into action at your command
- LEVEL UP YOUR HEROES  and upgrade their abilities
- 10+ TRINKETS AND ARTEFACTS for that extra action in battle.
- NEW POWERS AND REINFORCEMENTS to vanquish your foes, td style!
- 30 UPGRADES to train your army to their best form.
- 60+ DEADLY ENEMIES that will put all of your wit and strategic skills to the test
- RUSH TO SAVE THE KINGDOM as you bring down 6 mighty bosses in the most legendary boss fights!

Epic Selection of Towers and Upgrades
- 22 NEW TOWERS to defend your kingdom
- UNIQUE ABILITIES AND SPECIAL POWER for every tower
- Choose your arsenal of towers and execute your strategy. 

Create devastating combinations of towers, abilities and special powers to stop your enemies!

Near Endless Tower Defense Gameplay

- 42 CHALLENGING STAGES that will test your skills
- 9 DIFFERENT REALMS to conquer and explore
- EXPLORE new lands in the Kingdom
- 60+ ACHIEVEMENTS, hidden secrets, and fun stuff for you to play and discover while you explore the realm!
- UNLOCK HEROIC AND IRON CHALLENGES on all stages
- CASUAL, NORMAL, VETERAN OR IMPOSSIBLE difficulty for every level
- Summon enemy waves faster to earn additional gold

Time for some Royal Vengeance in the Kingdom!
Vez’nan, the powerful almighty wizard has returned. 

Lead your powerful dark army and make the Kingdom tremble with each step. Help Vez’nan conquer new lands in the kingdom! 

Orcs, goblins, demons, dark knights, zombies, and many more! Choose your favorites and mix them to find the most deadly tower defense combination - secure the crown of the kingdom for Vez’nan.

Awesome Offline Tower Defense Game

No Wi-Fi at your Dark Tower?

- PLAY ANYWHERE - playing offline works, if your wifi doesn’t
- PLAY OFFLINE - no internet connection required
- You can play Kingdom Rush Vengeance as your offline TD game of choice. 


--------------------------------------------------

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit.
Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp.

BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS!


• OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies!

• Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon!

DEFEAT THEM ALL

MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.

us.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策

生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

us.description:
Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition.


► Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival.

► 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories.

► 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage.

► 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration.

► Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful.

► 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences.

► 8.5 Polygon - Hyper Light Drifter deftly mixes contemplative moments with breakneck action.

► 5 Stars Darkstation - The top-down action-RPG Hyper Light Drifter is an amazing game: gorgeous, a fascinating world to explore, tight controls, beautiful music, and the faith in the player for you to figure things out on your own.


Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Drifters of this world are the collectors of forgotten knowledge, lost technologies and broken histories. Our Drifter is haunted by an insatiable illness, traveling further into the lands of Buried Time, hoping to discover a way to quiet the vicious disease.

Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies.


Features:

● 120 fps gameplay on iPad Pro / 60 fps on iPhone and iPad.
● Compatible with MFi controllers.
● Game Center achievements.
● Haptic Vibration.
● From each character to subtle background elements, everything is lovingly hand-animated.
● Easy to pick up, difficult to master; enemies are vicious and numerous, hazards will easily crush your frail body, and friendly faces remain rare.
● Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, discover equipment and traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths and secrets abound.
● Evocative soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace.
● All the content from the original game + more weapons, enemies and areas from the Special edition.

tr.description:
Explore a world made of blocks as you gather, craft, and build to defeat the evil Dragonlord! Build everywhere from anywhere in DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS, available now on mobile. Brought to you by SQUARE ENIX!

◆ TRAVEL AND EXPLORE THE VAST WORLD OF DRAGON QUEST!
In this “Block-Building RPG”, YOU are the legendary builder that has the power to build! The realm of Alefgard has been plunged into darkness by the terrible and treacherous Dragonlord, the ruler of all monsters. Venture off on the epic adventure to restore Alefgard!

◆ FACE OFF AGAINST VICIOUS FOES!
You will encounter Slimes, Golems, Dragons, and more. Familiar DRAGON QUEST monsters of all sizes threaten the survival of humankind! Craft weapons, build defenses, and fight the monsters to protect your base. Use your power to build and play smart when fighting against frightening enemies in action packed combat!

◆ GATHER, CRAFT AND BUILD FROM ANYWHERE!
In this world made of blocks, everything you see can be materials used to create! Farm ingredients, craft various items and build your base to unite the people roaming the ruins.  From buildings to entire towns, you have the freedom to make your village your very own. The power to build is in the palm of your hands!

◆ BUILD BETTER ON MOBILE WITH SPECIAL FEATURES ADDED!
Place blocks by simply tapping the screen and destroy blocks and items more easily with specialized cursors. A convenient Undo Button function has also been added to allow you to restore your work! 
Convert your buildings in to Build Cards to share with friends and scan their buildings to have them show up in your island!
◆ NEW DLC AS IN-APP PURCHASES
New DLC added in “Terra Incognita,” the land where you can freely build and play!
DLC includes:
• “Magic carpet”, “Boss figure pack”, “Celestial pack”, “Dot ring”
• “All in one pack” (A set of the above 4)
*Please be aware of duplicate purchases.

iOS 13 or later
iPhone 8 or later (minimum 3GB of RAM)"

*Playing this game on a non-recommended device may result in unexpected errors, such as crashing due to insufficient memory. Please be aware that we may not be able to provide support for non-recommended devices.

Awards:

● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

tr.description:
"Did you know that “Schadenfreude” is a German word defined as the concept of finding joy in someone else’s misfortune? It is also the main idea on which Neighbours back From Hell is built. A whole TV show based on playing increasingly outrageous pranks on your grumpy neighbor to keep the audience entertained, and viewership numbers high. It’s good to be bad in this early 2000s trash TV-inspired slapstick extravaganza! 

As Woody, the vengeful star protagonist of Neighbours back From Hell, you will prank your way through Seasons 1 and 2 of the fictitious, but aptly named TV show. Take the mischief from your nasty neighbor’s flat all the way to China, India, and Mexico where you will make sure his holiday is a living hell. While you’re at it, why limit targeting your antics at your neighbor, when you can involve his mother and fellow travelers? Whatever you decide to do, your trusty camera crew will be right there and keep a keen eye on all the action. You can let your crooked creativity flow freely and watch the neighbor rage in desperation. Just be mindful not to get caught by him or his companions, or they will whoop you good and your TV show will be taken off the air. If you perform well on the other hand, by creating more and more disarray and chaos in the neighbor’s life, ratings will increase, and you could win prestigious awards. "

Neighbours From Hell 1 & 2 Remastered in one package: 28 episodes set in the neighbor’s home, on a cruise liner, and in several different holiday locations around the world 

- All graphics newly rendered in Full HD 
- Framerate of all animations doubled for a smoother experience  
- Use stealth, skill, and style to perform the perfect ambush 
- Easy to use interface and controls 
- Superb cartoon-style graphics 
- Big band soundtrack 
- Game Center support
- Full controller support

© HandyGames

tr.description:
Get ready to jump into action and show the Kingdom who’s the real boss in the best tower defense game!

Face empires of mighty enemies. Clash against supreme bosses, unlocking and switching to new towers. Train legendary heroes and get all the achievements using your strategy in this amazing TD game.

Kingdom Rush Vengeance will give you hours and hours of gameplay in the best tower defense game available! 

Heroes, your Army, Enemies and legendary td bossfights!
- 17 Powerful HEROES who will, without hesitation, rush into action at your command
- LEVEL UP YOUR HEROES  and upgrade their abilities
- 10+ TRINKETS AND ARTEFACTS for that extra action in battle.
- NEW POWERS AND REINFORCEMENTS to vanquish your foes, td style!
- 30 UPGRADES to train your army to their best form.
- 60+ DEADLY ENEMIES that will put all of your wit and strategic skills to the test
- RUSH TO SAVE THE KINGDOM as you bring down 6 mighty bosses in the most legendary boss fights!

Epic Selection of Towers and Upgrades
- 22 NEW TOWERS to defend your kingdom
- UNIQUE ABILITIES AND SPECIAL POWER for every tower
- Choose your arsenal of towers and execute your strategy. 

Create devastating combinations of towers, abilities and special powers to stop your enemies!

Near Endless Tower Defense Gameplay

- 42 CHALLENGING STAGES that will test your skills
- 9 DIFFERENT REALMS to conquer and explore
- EXPLORE new lands in the Kingdom
- 60+ ACHIEVEMENTS, hidden secrets, and fun stuff for you to play and discover while you explore the realm!
- UNLOCK HEROIC AND IRON CHALLENGES on all stages
- CASUAL, NORMAL, VETERAN OR IMPOSSIBLE difficulty for every level
- Summon enemy waves faster to earn additional gold

Time for some Royal Vengeance in the Kingdom!
Vez’nan, the powerful almighty wizard has returned. 

Lead your powerful dark army and make the Kingdom tremble with each step. Help Vez’nan conquer new lands in the kingdom! 

Orcs, goblins, demons, dark knights, zombies and many more! Choose your favorites and mix them to find the most deadly tower defense combination - secure the crown of the kingdom for Vez’nan.

Awesome Offline Tower Defense Game

No Wi-Fi at your Dark Tower?

- PLAY ANYWHERE - playing offline works, if your wifi doesn’t
- PLAY OFFLINE - no internet connection required
- You can play Kingdom Rush Vengeance as your offline TD game of choice. 


--------------------------------------------------

HEARD ON THE MEDIA:
"For veteran Kingdom Rush players and newcomers alike, the charm and strategy of the franchise remains with Kingdom Rush: Vengeance, making it one of the best mobile games of 2018!"
-Polygon

"Kingdom Rush Vengeance is the biggest and baddest the series has been."
-148Apps

"Players with any affinity for tower-defense games are going to enjoy every second they spend with Kingdom Rush Vengeance!"
-Pocket gamer

"The game is intensely engaging with a light-hearted tone that makes it a real pleasure to jump into."
-Pocket tactics

tr.description:
Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit.
Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp.

BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS!
• OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies!
• 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up.
• UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy.
• Fortify the frontier in exotic new lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld!

TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES
• 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies!
• Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon!

DEFEAT THEM ALL
• OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before!
• MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades...

MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT
• Hours of gameplay with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements!
• IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up!
• CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills!
• 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode!
• PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline!

tr.description:
Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again!

Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics.

Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards.

FEATURES
- Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics
- Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX
- Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets
- Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade...
- Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivière and legend Yuzo Koshiro
- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics !

* NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE*

- New co-op moves
- +300 in-game improvements
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter

-MULTIPLAYER UPDATE-

- Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together!
- Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels"

-Mr. X Nightmare DLC-
The fight continues in Wood Oak City.
After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X’s brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. 
With this DLC, get ready for:
• 3 new playable characters
• A new Survival mode with weekly challenges
• Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves
• New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release.o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release.

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFicontrollers
- No micro-transactions!

Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go!

If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/
